title: Change in internal energy of gas

content.prompt: The graph above of pressure as a function of volume illustrates a thermodynamic process for an ideal gas in an engine. Which of the following best describes the change in the internal energy of the gas and the work done during the process?

choices.label: The internal energy increases, and positive work is done by the gas.
The internal energy decreases, and positive work is done on the gas.
The internal energy decreases, and positive work is done by the gas.
The internal energy increases, and positive work is done on the gas.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
